728366f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
728366f-a.original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728366f-a.text:
893 Arthur Kill Road, adjoining the N.W. corner of Richmond Avenue. This house is located on the estate of Emma L. Banker. The sign over the doorway reads: Concordia Collie Kennels, puppies for Sale, Boarding.
May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr

728367f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
728367f-a.original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728367f-a.text:
915 Arthur Kill Road, north side, between Richmond Avenue and Wainright Avenue. This house is on the estate of
Emma L. Bankem. The vtew is westward.
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr
(e)
The same, as viewed eastward from Waingright Avenue.
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr

728440f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
728440f-a.original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728440f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, east of Richmond Avenue, showing the residence on the George W. White estate. View 2 shows the 3-story barn and sheds. The estate was at one time known as the Green Ridge stock farm.

Spring 1924
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr

728447f-a.folder: Arthur Kill Road & Richmond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
728447f-a.original_title: Richmond: Arthur Kill Road - Richmond Avenue
728447f-a.text:
(1)
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Richmond and Wainright Avenues, showing the Bancker (Banker) House. The house is about 500 feet south of the road and is approachable by a private driveway.
May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the house and the private driveway as seen from Arthur Kill Road. The sign on the house reads: Will Rent For Restaurant.

May 17, 1932
P. L. Sperr

729320f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island, NY
729320f-a.original_title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Arthur Kill Road
729320f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, north of Arthur Kill Road, showing construction work in progrrss on the new Fresh Kills Bridge over Richmond Creek. View 3 shows pontoons with pipes from
sandsucker.
January 31, 1931
Views 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr

729322f-a.folder: Richmond Avenue & Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island, NY
729322f-a.original_title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Arthur Kill Road
729322f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, north from Arthur Kill Road, showing, on the right side of the thoroughfare, land being filled for the erection of a new bridge over Richmond Creek.

The three views were taken the same day.
January 31, 1931
Views 1-2-3
P. L. Sperr
